LanguageData.MedicineHerbal.label: herbal medicine
LanguageData.MedicineHerbal.description: A pack of herbal concoctions extracted from the healroot plant. It is less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals, but much better than nothing.
LanguageData.MedicineIndustrial.label: medicine
LanguageData.MedicineIndustrial.description: A kit of industrial-era medical equipment. It contains basic drugs, tools for suturing and bone setting, diagnostic devices, and various pads and fluids.
LanguageData.MedicineUltratech.label: glitterworld medicine
LanguageData.MedicineUltratech.description: A kit of advanced ultra-tech medical supplies, probably manufactured on a distant glitterworld. It contains advanced polymorphic drugs, nanite diagnostic and healing assisters, a mini-imager, and various multi-use tools.
LanguageData.ComponentIndustrial.label: component
LanguageData.ComponentIndustrial.description: Miscellaneous gears, capacitors, circuit boards, tubes, wheels, sensors, wires, chips, processors, and other electronic and industrial parts. Necessary for assembling complex machines or electronics.
LanguageData.ComponentSpacer.label: advanced component
LanguageData.ComponentSpacer.description: Advanced computing and energy-directing machinery, miniaturized and hardened for the most demanding applications.
LanguageData.Neutroamine.label: нейротрамін
LanguageData.Neutroamine.description: A synthetic precursor chemical. While it is useless on its own, many drugs require neutroamine as an ingredient.
LanguageData.Chemfuel.label: пальне
LanguageData.Chemfuel.description: A volatile liquid chemical. Used to fuel engines and rockets, or to transmute into propellant for projectiles, or as an incendiary weapon.
